text: And now, there ’ s her hugely anticipated single titled “ Work. ” It ’ s about working for a paycheck no matter what else is going on in your life. It is also, of course, designed to get her that paycheck. You might call the way it goes about attaining this goal brazen for anyone else but Rihanna : Tempting accusations of boringness, hackiness, and crimes against art, the song offers a hook that practically parodies pop ’ s love of repetition — and then repeats it, a lot. But there ’ s something fascinating about the tune, something that elevates it beyond ringtone status. It doesn ’ t really go anywhere. It approximates what work feels like.
